kodkod.core.bool
Class BooleanConstant

java.lang.Object
  kodkod.core.bool.BooleanValue
      kodkod.core.bool.BooleanConstant
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<BooleanValue>
public final class BooleanConstant
extends BooleanValue

Represents a boolean constant, true or false. The integer literal of the true and false constants are Integer.MAX_VALUE and -Integer.MAX_VALUE, respectively. The two boolean constants, TRUE and FALSE, are status among all factories.

Author:
Emina Torlak
specfield:
value: boolean
invariant:
value => Integer.MAX_VALUE, -Integer.MAX_VALUE
